Definitions

  - "TwitchDownloader"
    Any of the TwitchDownloaderCLI, TwitchDownloaderCore, and TwitchDownloaderWPF
    libraries.

  - "You" (or "Your")
    An individual or Legal Entity exercising permissions granted by this License.

Notice

  This notice MUST be included UNMODIFIED with all copies, modifications, and
  redistributions of the TwitchDownloader libraries unless explicit written
  permission from a maintainer is given.

  The TwitchDownloader libraries are provided free of charge under the MIT
  license. As per this license, you are permitted to utilize, modify,
  and redistribute the TwitchDownloader libraries in any form under the
  conditions:
   - This notice is included with any source files; and
   - This notice is included with any compiled binaries; and
   - The third party licenses file is updated to reflect to any modifications
     made.

  TwitchDownloader utilizes several third party libraries and resources provided
  under various licenses. The full list of third party components and licenses
  can be found in the file THIRD-PARTY-LICENSES.txt.
